description:
The lands of Arborea are filled with danger and wonder in TERA, the acclaimed action MMORPG. As one of the last remaining humans, elves, argons or popori, it is up to you to adventure across the epic continent and push back the darker forces that threaten the world.

From the majestic Elven forests of Avisterra to the harsh Desert of Derelicts, you will explore vast open zones filled with towering monsters, hidden dungeons and quests around every corner. Battle against giants, dragons and demonic threats using fast-paced and visceral real-time combat. Wield swords, axes, magic or technological weapons as you engage enemies in strategic battles.

Raid gigantic dungeons with your comrades, facing challenges that will test even the most grizzled of veterans. Join a guild and partake in large-scale PvP warfare, sieging castles and battling for dominance over contested zones. Or test your mettle in competitive arena matches.

As you increase in level and power, customizing your character with unique races, classes and gear, you will unravel Arborea's rich lore and mysteries. What dark god has begun to stir from its eternal prison? With allies old and new, you must journey to new lands across treacherous seas, all in an effort to save this world from the brink of annihilation. The fate of the continent is in your hands, brave adventurer - will you rise to save Arborea?
name: TERA

yoast_head_json.og_description: The lands of Arborea are filled with danger and wonder in TERA, the acclaimed action MMORPG. As one of the last remaining humans, elves, argons or popori, it is up to you to adventure across the epic continent and push back the darker forces that threaten the world. Raid gigantic dungeons with your comrades, facing challenges that will test even the most grizzled of veterans. Join a guild and partake in large-scale PvP warfare, sieging castles and battling for dominance over contested zones. Or test your mettle in competitive arena matches. As you increase in level and power, customizing your character with unique races, classes and gear, you will unravel Arborea’s rich lore and mysteries. What dark god has begun to stir from its eternal prison? With allies old and new, you must journey to new lands across treacherous seas, all in an effort to save this world from the brink of annihilation. The fate of the continent is in your hands, brave adventurer – will you rise to save Arborea?
